title: 'To frame Kirk's death as escalation misses the truth. The real threat is normalization'
subhead: British geographer Clionadh Raleigh examines the consequences of the assassination of the conservative influencer. By dismissing the fact that the man charged with this murder is a 'lone wolf' and accusing the left, the Trump administration is paving the way for more violence, she says.

title: Fleeing Nayib Bukele's authoritarian drift, dozens of Salvadorans take refuge in Guatemala

title: Relationship sex: Why many women still feel pressure to say yes
subhead: Many women have sex with their partners even when they do not want to, out of reluctance to say no, uncertainty about desire, or fear of offending. Together, these reasons sketch the contours of a gray zone of consent.
